properties.areaDesc: Christian, MO; Greene, MO; Stone, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 5:45AM CST until January 18 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Christian County in southwestern Missouri...
Northeastern Stone County in southwestern Missouri...
Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri...

* Until 545 PM CST Saturday.

* At 540 AM CST, reporting gauges indicated that the James River
was likely to flood out of its banks across southeast Greene
County, northwest Christian County, and northeast Stone County.
Up to one and a half inches of rain fell across this basin over
the past 24 hours.  Some of it's smaller tributaries are likely
flooding as well, along with Wilsons Creek near Old Limey Road.
While no additional rainfall is expected, residual flooding is
likely through this morning.

* Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the warning include...
Southeastern Springfield...       Nixa...
Ozark...                          Battlefield...
Rogersville...                    Sparta...
Highlandville...                  Fremont Hills...
Spokane...                        Turners...
Chestnutridge...                  Selmore...
Christian Center...               Ponce de Leon...
Chadwick...                       Linden...
Boaz...                           Galloway...

This warning includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Route U at Pedelo Creek northeast of Sparta...
Farm Road 164 at the James River in southeast Springfield...
Old Limey Road at Wilson's Creek...
Center Road at Bull Creek...
and Holder Road at Green Valley Creek.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
